question: Cosuming "plain" cheese...My son consumes a lot of cheese, and we have been told by persons that you are not allowed to eat cheese plain
answer:
QUESTION
My son consumes a lot of cheese, and we have been told by persons that you are not allowed to eat cheese plain, i.e it must be eating on bread, roll, biscuits. Is this a myth, cause these persons insists that there is some islamic "hadith" but they are not sure why you are unable to eat cheese plain.
ANSWER


Share:
This is a myth. It is permissible to eat plain cheese.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
